Status Build¶

The status build operation listens for update notifications in the CouchDB. It responds two two kinds o notifications.

  1. Mappings. This is a change to one of the mappings that provides GTF values for the feed.
  2. Feeds. This is a one-minute tail of the position log.

Log and Mapping Capture

Route Capture
